meanings.sent1: The meatmen at the butcher shop always have fresh cuts available.
meanings.sent2: I bought some chicken from the meatmen at the market.
meanings.sent3: The meatmen joked about having a 'beef' with the vegetable sellers.
meanings.sent4: The meatmen were the knights of the culinary world, wielding their knives with precision.
meanings.sent5: The image of the meatmen carving the meat lingered in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who work in the meat industry.
meanings.sent1: The meatmen in the slaughterhouse wore protective gear.
meanings.sent2: The meatmen gathered for a meeting to discuss industry trends.
meanings.sent3: The meatmen formed a band called 'The Sizzling Sausages'.
meanings.sent4: The meatmen were the backbone of the meat industry, ensuring quality and safety.
meanings.sent5: The meatmen's dedication to their craft was evident in every cut they made.
